name: Global Black for AMOLED - Dark Red theme
description: This style is a darker version of my "Editing Global Black for AMOLED - Red theme" style which is a fork of "Global Black for AMOLED displays" created by user 288422. It is applied to all webpages and it's purpose is the same as the original style: save battery on AMOLED displays and/or reduce eye strain in low light.
